title: Modeling-Based Elementary Interdisciplinary Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts, awareness of elementary education curriculum structure, and ability to utilize online learning tools
context.additional_context: Most Learners Access LMS via Smartphone Environments; Requires Physical Environments with Low-Cost Teaching Aids

learning_goals: Learners can explain an integrated elementary curriculum (math/science/technology) model design process in three or more stages
Learners can accurately perform angle/distance measurement activities using low-cost prototypes (paper protractors, etc.) with over 80% precision
Learners can propose two strategies for engaging students with learning barriers through modeling activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
